H.'s major challenge is seasonality. She hopes to build houses for rental purposes and improve her family's living standards. She joined Yehu because of its accessibility to sustainable financial services.

loans.use: To buy wheat flour, cowpeas and sugar

loans.name: Jean Didier

texts.fr:
Âgé de 35, marié père de 3 enfants qui est dans la vente des sacs (sacs à mains, sacs d’écoliers, sacs de voyage et sandales homme et femmes). Son commerce marche bien et la difficulté se situe dans l’approvisionnement des articles rares et à la mode.  Au cours de l’année, pendant la période des vacances, à la rentrée scolaire et pendant les fêtes de fin d’année les ventes sont excellentes et il peut vendre jusqu'à atteindre 100 mille francs jour .
 Depuis 2002 il est dans ce commerce et élève ses 3 filles en  leurs assurant  une bonne scolarité et espère leurs laissées une bonne héritage en multipliant les coins de ventes. 
  Il voudrai  importé pour faire plus de bénéfice et devenir commerçant grossiste
s’il a le prêt maintenant, il achèterai beaucoup plus et par rapport à la concurrence, il aurai les meilleurs prix pour attirer les clients. Il est respecté chez  lui et au marché auprès de ceux qui l’on vue évolué, car il est très ambitieux et veut faire plus pour changer sa situation actuelle.
texts.en:
This young man, 35, married and the father of three children sells bags (handbags, school bags, suitcases) and sandals for men and women. His business is going well and his challenges are finding rare and stylish items. Over the course of the year, during school vacations, when children go back to school, and during the holidays at the end of the year, he makes lots of sales, sometimes amounting to 100,000 F per day. Since 2002 he has been in this business and he has been raising his three daughters, insuring their continued schooling. He hopes to leave them a good inheritance by having various sales points. He would like to be an importer so as to make more profit and become a wholesaler. If he receives this loan he will buy a lot more and, with respect to his competitors, he will have better prices so he can attract customers. He is respected at home and at the market by those who have seen him grow, as he is very ambitious and wants to do even more to change his present status.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: buying more items such as sheets, bags, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es: El solicitante es soltero, vive en casa alquilada junto a sus padres, tiene 10 años trabajando en el negocio de venta de relojes y accesorios; anteriormente lo manejaba su padre el cual es mayor edad, ademas realiza servicios de reparacion y limpieza de relojes, realiza compras quincenales en lima o le realizan envios de acuerdo a su necesidad. Cuenta con una experiencia crediticia en Mi Banco por credito vigente para su negocio. Solicita financiamiento para remodelacion de mobiliario; compras de vitrinas para su negocio
texts.en:
The applicant is single, and he lives in a rented house with his parents. He has been working in the business of selling watches and accessories for ten years. His father, who is elderly, previously ran the business. He also does repairs and cleans watches. He makes his purchases in Lima every two weeks, or they send him shipments as needed. He has loan experience in his bank; he has a loan for his business. He is requesting a loan to remodel his furnishings and buy display cases for his business.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy display cases to show his products

loans.name: Ruth Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Ruth es una mujer trabajadora, que a mucho esfuerzo logro poner su propio negocio, una pequeña pulpería en donde vende variedades, lo inicio con ayuda de su esposo, que se dedica a la agricultura, pues son de pocos recursos económicos. 
Pero que se esfuerzan para sobresalir adelante, las ventas han estado bajas y tiene poco inventario lo que requiere de capital para poder comprar productos de consumo diario. 
La dificultad que tiene es el techo que se le pasa el agua, es por eso desea comprar zinc nuevo para poder hacer la mejora a su casa.
Y poder invertir un poco en el negocio para lograr equilibrar las ventas. Lo que seria de muchas utilidades y ganancias.
texts.en:
Ruth is a hardworking woman who, with much effort, managed to start her own business--a small grocery store where she sells a variety of products. At first she had help from her husband, a farmer, because they had few economic resources. She's made the effort to get ahead, but sales have been low and she has little inventory. She requires capital to be able to buy daily needs products. The difficulty she faces is her leaking roof; for that reason she wants to buy new zinc (corrugated iron) to be able to improve her house and invest a little in the business in order to balance out the sales, which would be very useful and profitable.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Richardson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of zinc (corrugated iron) for her leaky roof and to invest in her business

loans.name: Hellen

texts.es: Hellen G. V., tiene la edad de 30 años, está casada, y  tiene 1  hijo de 9 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de algunos terneros y su alimentación. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al ganado para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. También desea aumentar el número de animales y poder mantenerlos en mejores condiciones, cuenta con un área idónea para el mantenimiento y cría del ganado. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Doña Hellen tiene algunos años dedicado al ganado. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora.
texts.en:
Hellen G. V. is 30 years old, married and has a 9-year-old son. She wants the loan in order to buy some calves and their feed. She wishes to adequately raise them in order to obtain the most income possible when she sells them. She also wishes to increase the number of animals and keep them in better conditions. She has an ideal place for raising cattle. This is the first time that she is taking a loan from FUDECOSUR and is very happy with the services provided. Hellen has been raising cattle for several years. She hopes in the future to provide her family with a better quality of life and greater economic stability and to continue growing as a person and as a merchant.

Translated from Spanish by Jacqueline Demeranville, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Ami Chantal Essenam

texts.fr: Cette femme s’est spécialisé dans le commerce  de pagnes  depuis 2007, elle a associé à cela la vente d’eau en sachet  appelée pure WATER. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Elle veut dynamiser son commerce raison pour laquelle elle sollicite pour la deuxième fois un crédit de WAGES qui lui permettra d’acheter 10 pièces de pagnes  de grandes qualités. Elle est célibataire, c’est  avec le revenu de son commerce qu’elle  subvient  à ses besoins.
texts.en:
This woman has been selling “pagnes” [traditional fabric for wrap clothing] since 2007; in addition, she also sells drinking water in plastic pouches known as “Pure Water.” She buys her stock at the big market in Lomé. She would like to give her business a boost, which is why she is seeking a second loan from WAGES, allowing her to purchase ten sets of high-quality “pagnes.” She is single, and the income derived from this business allows her to support herself.

Translated from French by Ekaterina Sukhanova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing traditional "pagnes" cloth and water in plastic pouches

loans.name: Ericka De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Ericka es una joven de 30 años de edad, madre de un hijo, casada, trabaja como técnico evaluador en una empresa privada, pues no fue fácil encontrar trabajo pero nada imposible, aplico mediante curricumlo.
Aun vive en casa de sus padres ya que no tienen el dinero suficiente para poder comprar su propio terreno y poder construir.
Lo que hará con este préstamo es la compra de materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro entre otros para poder hacer un anexo en el cuarto para lograr estar en mejores condiciones con su hijo. Contenta ya que hará posible esta inversión que espera lograr con los años su propia casa a trabes de los financiamientos.
texts.en:
Ericka is a young woman of 30, the mother of one child, and a wife. She works as a technician evaluator for a private company. It wasn't easy to find work, but it wasn't impossible; she applied through a curriculum. She still lives with her parents because she doesn't have enough money to buy her own land and build on it. With this loan she will buy construction materials such as: stone, sand, cement, and iron, among other things, to build an annex to her room to be able to live in better conditions with her son. She's happy because with this investment it will be possible, after a few years, to buy her own home with the help of financing.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Richardson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of stone, sand, cement, iron, and other materials to build an annex on her room to have a little more space

loans.name: Massan Afi Dodji

texts.fr:
Cette dame est une femme très dynamique, elle s’est lancée en 2001 dans le commerce de pagnes. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé, sa clientèle grandit et son stock actuel ne peut répondre à la demande de tous ses  clients, pour rémédier à cela elle sollicite chez wages son premier crédit pour acheter  10  pagnes Holand et 25 pagnes HI target.
Elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle contribue avec son revenu aux charges financières de la famille.
texts.en:
This lady is very dynamic and began trading in "pagnes" (West African colourful fabric) in 2001. She gets her supplies at the large market in Lomé. Her customer base is growing and her current stock is not sufficient to meet the demand of all her customers. In order to remedy this she is requesting a first loan from WAGES to buy 10 Holand "pagnes" and 25 HI Target "pagnes". She is married and mother to two children. With her income she contributes to the household expenses.

Translated from French by Alison Le Bras, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of "pagnes"

loans.name: Latifatou

texts.fr: Cette femme est âgée de 34 ans, elle s’est lancée en 2008 dans le commerce de détail de  jus et de savons liquide, elle fait face en ce moment à une baisse de  stock raison pour laquelle elle sollicite de WAGES son deuxième crédit après remboursement du premier pour l’achat de 16 sacs de produits de jus et  4 cartons de savons liquide. Elle est mariée et mère de 1 enfant.
texts.en:
This woman is 34 years old. Since 2008, she has been retailing juices and liquid soaps. At the moment, her stock is depleted, which is why she is seeking a second loan from WAGES, the first one having been duly reimbursed. This loan is to help purchase 16 bags of juice products and 4 cartons of liquid soap. She is married and the mother of one child.

Translated from French by Ekaterina Sukhanova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing juice products and liquid soap

loans.name: Abena

texts.en: Abena K. sells popcorn, meat pies and locally made drinks near a school at Abura.  Abena is married to a pastor and stays with her child.  She has not received any form of education. She helps in the general upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy more ingredients to make pastries to sell. Her expectation is to use the new profits to enhance her business.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients to make pastries

loans.name: Kaina Evangelina

texts.es:
Karina de 22 años, vive en una zona urbana en las Orquídeas (llamado así porque en su originalidad había muchas flores orquídeas)  de Guayaquil, ella es vendedora de productos de belleza por catalogo. 

Una amiga de Karina la inscribió como vendedora después de saber que Karina necesitaba trabajo, poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación ella ha promocionado los productos. Trabaja todos los días, veden perfumes, cremas, shampoo, etc. 

Para tener mas ingresos ella quiere comprar con el préstamo perfumes y cosméticos. En el futuro quiere ser directora de las vendedoras y tener un local de cosméticos.
texts.en:
Karina is 22-years-old. She lives in an urban neighborhood in Orquideas ("Orchids") (named for the many orchids that flourished there originally) in Guayaquil. She sells beauty products from catalogs. A friend of Karina enrolled her as a salesperson after learning that she needed work. Little by little, with effort and dedication, Karina has promoted her products. She works everyday selling perfumes, creams, shampoo, etc. In order to have a better income she wants to use the loan to buy perfumes and cosmetics to sell. In the future she wants to be a director of sales and have her own cosmetics shop.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Richardson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of perfumes and cosmetics

loans.name: Luis Rey

texts.es:
Luis Rey de 50 años de edad, vive en la Cmca. Carquita del municipio de La Libertad, es casado con la Sra. Margarita Rocha con quien procreo 4 hijos, el mayor de 24 años, otro de 22, 16 y 8 años, los mayores le ayudan a trabajar y el menor estudia primaria. 

Don Luis desde hace 20 años es pequeño ganadero del municipio de La Libertad, Chontales, donde tiene su pequeño inventario de ganado, sin embargo, esta luchando para aumentarlo por lo que esta solicitando su 4to credito para compar terneros y desarrollarlos y engordarlos para posteriormente venderlos a un buen precio que le permita obtener ganancias que le ayuden a mejorar sus condiciones de vida familiar.  Ademas de la actividad ganadera tambien tiene un camion que funciona como transporte colectivo que le genera ingresos adicionales para su familia. 

Su mayor sueño es tener la oportunidad de contar con recursos que le permitan darle a sus hijos estudios para que sean hombres de bien, y dejarles un buen patrimonio para que puedan mantenerse con un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Luis Rey is 50 years old, lives in la Carquita district in the municipality of La Libertad and is married to Mrs. Margarita Rocha with whom he has 4 children, the oldest is 24 years old, the others are 22, 16, and 8 years old. The three eldest children help him with work while the youngest is in primary school. For 20 years Luis has been a cattle herder in the municipality of La Libertad, Chontales, where he has a small inventory of cattle. He is trying to increase the size of his herd and this is why he is asking for his fourth loan to buy calves, raise them, and fatten them so that he can sell them at a good price that allows him to earn profits which help him improve his family’s living conditions. In addition to his work as a cattle herder, he also has a truck that he uses as collective transport which allows him to earn additional money for his family. His biggest dream is to have the resources that allow him to teach his children to be good men and leave them a good inheritance that they can have a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Halea Meese, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy calves to raise for sale

loans.name: Mawussi

texts.fr: Ce monsieur est très dynamique et travailleur, étant père de famille l’activité qu’il exerce et qui lui permet de subvenir aux charges de sa famille est la fabrication de savons puis ensuite sa vente, sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes. Les entrants dans la fabrication du savons sont épuisés, il veut se réapprovisionner raison pour laquelle il sollicite un deuxième prêt de WAGES  pour acheter  100 bidons d’huile et 50 sacs de soudes. Il est mariée et père de 3 enfants.
texts.en:
This gentleman is very dynamic and a hard worker. He has a business making and then selling soaps, and, being a father, this allows him to cover his family's expenses. His customer base is made up of all types of people. His stock of products for making soaps has run out and he would like to get fresh supplies. For this reason he is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy 100 containers of oil and 50 bags of caustic soda. He is married and father to three children.

Translated from French by Alison Le Bras, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Production and sale of soaps

loans.name: Carmen Del Pilar

texts.es: El solicitante vive en casa de sus padres los cuales son clientes de nuestra entidad financiera. Tiene un credito hipotecario. Cuenta con un negocio de zapatos en la galeria Gamarrita hace 2 años. Tiene buena experiencia crediticia con CREDISCOTIA y CMAC ICA. El destino del credito es para compra de mercaderias referente a la estacion
texts.en:
The loan applicant lives in her parents house and they are also Kiva loan recipients. She has a mortgage and has had a shoe store in the Gamarrita shopping mall for two years. She has good credit with CREDISCOTIA y CMAC ICA. The loan will be used to buy merchandise for the season.

Translated from Spanish by Halea Meese, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Merchandise Purchase

loans.name: Brigida Rosa

texts.es:
Brigida de 64 años de edad es casada con el Sr. Luciano Garcia con quien tiene 3 hijos de 23, 19 y 18 años de edad los cuales les ayudan a trabajar en su pequeña finca ubicada en la Cmca. El Zapote jurisdiccion de el municipio de La Libertad. Tiene una gran experiencia en la actividad agropecuaria, pues desde hace mas de 30 años que trabaja en ella, cuenta con inventario ganadero propio.  

Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo de comprar insumos (semillas de pasto, urea e insectisida) con los cuales prepara la tierra para posteriormente sembar pasto, los que comercializara y le generara ingresos para el sosten familiar.  

El mayor sueño de doña Brigida es poder aumentar los recursos de su finca para brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Brigida is 64 years old and is married to Luciano Garcia with whom she has three children aged 23, 19, and 18 years. All her children help with the work on the small farm located in the Cmca. El Zapote jurisdiction of the municipality La Libertad. She has a lot of experience with the agricultural and livestock sector and after working in this sector for more than 30 years, she has her own livestock herd. She is applying for her first loan to pay for farming supplies (grass seeds, urea, and insecticide) that she will use to ready the soil for planting grass, which she will sell and use to generate income for her family. Brigida’s dream is to be able to increase the productivity of her farm so that she can better the living conditions of her children.

Translated from Spanish by Halea Meese, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of farm supplies

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua T. is a widow taking care of three children. She has received a junior high education.  Efua cooks kokonte (dired cassava flour) to sell at Abura. Efua uses the income she generates from her sales to take care of her children. Efua will use the loan to purchase more cassava to process into flour to cook and sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Efua plans to save to build a house for her children.

loans.use: To purchase more cassava

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Cette femme a ouvert depuis 2008 son propre atelier de vente des articles de mercerie qu’elle a appelé « NINA SHOP », actuellement elle veut gonfler son stock de marchandises raison pour laquelle elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l’achat de 10 rouleaux de popeline, 10 cartons de fil à coudre1 et 15 cartons d’épingle. Sa clientèle se compose de toute personne ; elle mariée et mère d’un enfant.
texts.en:
This lady opened her own workshop to sell haberdashery products in 2008; she named this workshop " NINA SHOP". At present she wants to boost her stock of goods and for this reason she is requesting a loan from WAGES to buy ten rolls of poplin, ten boxes of sewing thread and 15 boxes of pins. Her customer base is made up of all types of people. She is married and has one child.

Translated from French by Alison Le Bras, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of haberdashery products

loans.name: Fabiola Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Fabiola de 37 años de edad, es madre de familia de cinco hijos, se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos, perfume productos Avon, para poder aportar con los gastos básicos. Su esposo trabaja como oficial de la policía Nacional.
Contenta por que pronto tendrá su casa que ha deseado tanto para dar a sus hijos un techo digno, todavía esta en la construcción falta poner el techo. Con este financiamiento quiere invertir en la compra de ropa. Zapatos, cosméticos, perfume para seguir vendiendo y poder ayudar a los gastos. Para lograr terminar su casa que le falta poco.
Sus planes es lograr aumentar de volumen en las ventas para lograr clientes nuevos, afiliarse con otras empresas para obtener productos accesibles de precios y lograr vender mas.
texts.en:
Doña Fabiola, 37, is a mother of five. She sells clothing, shoes, and Avon perfume products in order to be able to contribute to basic costs. Her husband works as a police officer for the National Police. She is happy because they will soon have their own home, which they have wanted so dearly in order to give their children a dignified roof over their heads. It is still under construction and they need to add the roof. With the requested loan, she wants to invest in the purchase of clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and perfume in order to keep selling. She will also be able to help with costs and be able to finish their home, which is almost complete. She plans to expand her merchandise in order to get new clients, and to affiliate herself with other businesses in order to obtain products with better prices, and thus sell more.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Clothing, shoes and cosmetics

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua R. has nine dependants. She has received a junior high education. Ekua processes palm oil for distribution to her customers at Abura. Ekua uses her income to take care of her family. Ekua will use the loan to buy more fruits to process into palm oil for sale. With the new returns from her expanded business, Ekua plans to reinvest into her business.

loans.use: T buy more fruits to process into palm oil for sale.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua A. is married and has three children. She has been through junior high school.  Ekua bakes bread to sell at Abura. Her husband works with the information service.  Ekua uses her income to help her husband pay school fees and utility bills.  Ekua will use the loan to purchase more ingredients to bake bread to sell. With the new earnings from her extended business, Ekua plans to save to build a house.

loans.use: To purchase more ingredients

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 35 años, es casada y tiene tres hijos en su poder, juntos viven en la comunidad de Sirenachayocc, ubicada en la hermosa selva cuzqueña, donde tienen su propia casa a base de adobe. Para Julia las enseñanzas y lecciones que le dejó su familia han sido de mucha importancia para ella, y por ello les debe mucho. Hoy tiene una tienda de abarrotes, realizando las ventas dentro de su domicilio, en donde la mayoría de sus vecinos acuden a su establecimiento. Sin embargo hubo tiempos de crisis para ella y su familia, cuando en un inicio no le resultó el puesto de comida que antes ofrecía. Con el tiempo y con el apoyo de su esposo se arriesgaron en instalar una tienda y no se equivocaron, ahora obtienen buenas ganancias. Mas adelante desean incursionar en la actividad agraria, cultivando cacao y café, con la finalidad de darle otros ingresos extras, para que así  contrarreste cualquier problema que se le presente en su camino. Generalmente trabaja por cuenta propia, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus hijos. Sus planes a futuro es ampliar su negocio en otras localidades ubicadas estratégicamente, con el propósito de captar nuevos clientes. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a pagar de manera puntual, además se siente contento con su grupo comunal. Con el crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería para abastecer su tienda, con la finalidad de poder incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Julia is 35 years old. She is married and is raising three children. They live together in the community of Sirenachayocc, located in the beautiful jungle of Cuzco, where they have their own house made of adobe. For Julia, the lessons and learning her family left her have been very important, and for this she owes them a lot. Today she has a grocery store, selling from her house. Most of her neighbors go to her establishment. Nonetheless her family went throuh some crises, when at first selling food that she offered before didn't work out. With time and with the support of her husband, they took the risk of setting up the store and it wasn't a mistake- now they make good earnings. In the future, they want to get into agriculture, growing coffee and cacao, in order to have extra income and set aside something for any problem that comes their way. She generally does the work herself, but on ocassions receives help from her children. Her plans for the future are to expand her business to other strategically located locales in order to attract new customers. This is her fourth loan with MFP and she is committed to making the payments on time. She also feels happy with her community group. With the loan she is asking for, she will invest in purchasing a greater quantity of merchandise to supply her store, in order to increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more merchandise to supply her store.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos M. C., tiene la edad de 39 años, está en unión libre, y  tiene 4  hijos, tienen 1, 10, 16 y 17 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para hacer reparaciones en su casa. Desea comprar materiales para poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda. También terminar algunos trabajos inconclusos en su casa. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Carlos se dedica a la agricultura, tiene algunos años dedicado a la siembra del café. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Carlos M. C., 39, is in a common-law marriage and has 4 children: aged 1, 10, 16 and 17. He wants a loan to make repairs to his house. He wants to buy materials with which he can improve the conditions of his home. He also wants to finish some unfinished projects in his house. This is the first time that he has taken a loan with FUDECOSUR, and he is very pleased with the ease of payments they provide. Don Carlos works in agriculture; he has cultivated coffee for a number of years. He hopes in the future to provide his family with a better quality of life and better economic stability, and to be able to continue growing as a person and a farmer.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: home improvement

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes K. fries to-gbee (locally made doughnut) at Abura.  Agnes has received a junior high education.  She is married and has five dependants. Her husband is a farmer. Agnes has been frying to-gbee for some time now. She responsibly contributes to taking care of her family. Her loan will be used to buy more ingredients to fry the doughnuts. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to enter into other types of baking to bring variety into her business.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients

loans.name: Aba Adedzewah

texts.en: Aba A. is divorced and has four children. She buys bags of rice and later bags them into smaller quantity for sale by moving from one house to another. She has no educational background. Aba uses her income for the general upkeep of the home.  Aba will use the loan to buy more bags of rice for resale. With the new profits from her extended business, Aba plans to save to buy a shop for her business so she can supply in larger quantities.

loans.use: To buy more bags of rice for resale.

loans.name: Araba

texts.en: Araba M. bakes meat pies, cakes and other pastries at Abura.  Araba is divorced and is taking care of six dependants. Araba has been selling pastries for some time now. She spends her income on the welfare of her family. Her loan will be used to buy more ingredients to bake for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to reinvest back into her business.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients to bake

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua A. produces Fante kenkey herself to sell at Abura.  Efua has been educated up to the junior high level.  She is married and has 10 children. Her husband is a farmer and together they take care of the family. Her loan will be used to buy additional bags of maize to prepare kenkey for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save for her children’s education.

loans.use: To buy additional bags of maize

loans.name: Agustín

texts.es: Agustín G. C., tiene la edad de 21 años, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de algunos terneros y su alimentación. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al ganado para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. También desea aumentar el número de animales y poder mantenerlos en mejores condiciones, cuenta con un área idónea para el mantenimiento y cría del ganado. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Agustín tiene algunos años dedicado al ganado. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Agustín G. C. is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents and siblings. He is requesting this loan in order to purchase some calves and to feed them well. He wants to take good care of his cattle so that he can obtain the best possible price when he sells them. He also hopes to increase his number of animals and to be able to keep them under better conditions, in a suitable area for keeping and breeding cattle. This is the first time that he has received a loan from FUDECOSUR and he is very happy with the services they have offered him. Agustín has been raising cattle for several years. He hopes in the future to provide his family with a better quality of life and greater economic stability, and to be able to continue growing as a person and as a businessman.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Deysi

texts.es: Daisy tiene 43 años, ella es una carismática mujer que vive con su pareja quien es obrero y sus tres hijos. Todos ellos viven juntos en su propia casa. Hace mas de 2 años atrás ella se dedica en la venta de ropa, pues  necesitaba de una actividad que le permitiera pasar tiempo con su familia, sobre todo de sus hijos. Es así que gracias a su gran carisma y poder de convencimiento, que aprovechó para incursionar en la venta de ropa. Desde entonces se dirige cada cierto tiempo a los mercados centrales de la capital para adquirir prendas de vestir, de los más variados colores y modelos, para luego ser ofrecidos a sus vecinas, amigas y familiares quienes son sus principales clientes. Paralelo a este trabajo, también le hacen pedidos de traer mercadería de ropa en cantidad para otros comerciantes. En un futuro quiere tener un local donde pueda ofrecer toda su mercadería y hacerla mas atractiva. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser muy puntual con todos los pagos de las cuotas. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará ropa de invierno para esta temporada.
texts.en:
Daisy is 43 years old. She is a charismatic woman who lives wither her spouse who is a laborer, and their three children. They all live together in their own house. She has been selling clothes for more than 2 years, because she needed an activity that allowed her to spend time with her family, especially her children. Thanks to her great charisma and power of persuasion, she was able to get into selling clothes. Since then, she goes periodically to the central markets of the capital to acquire clothing of various colors and patterns in order to offer them to her neighbors, friends and family, who are her main customers. At the same time, people also order clothing merchandise from her to bring in bulk to other merchants. In the future, she wants to have a locale where she can offer all of her merchandise and make it more attractive. This is her second loan with MFP and she is committed to making all of her payments on time. With the loan she is asking for, she will purchase winter clothing for the season.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase clothing for the winter season.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 58 años, es una mujer soltera que vive en su casa propia al lado de sus 6 hijos; quienes ya son independientes. El trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de productos de belleza y con el paso del tiempo la convirtió en una experta en la venta, ahora es promotora, líder de la zona en la que vive. Desde entonces se encarga de un número determinado de vendedoras, a quienes debe monitorear y proveerles de productos para que ellas los vendan. Elena se siente muy contenta con su trabajo, dedicándole la mayoría de su tiempo a ello. Además posee en stocks cosméticos, lo cual ofrece a sus clientes, quienes fieles le hacen algún pedido previo. Su prioridad es mejorar su negocio y por ello necesita mayor capital para aumentar su stock. Ella es un cliente muy antiguo en MFP pero siempre destaco por ser muy puntual con los pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, quiere comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería para tenerla en stock.
texts.en:
Elena is 58, and is a single woman who lives in her own house with her six adult children. She makes a living by selling beauty products, and with time she has turned into an expert. She has become a sales promoter and the leader of the area that she lives in. Since then she has been in charge of a fixed number of saleswomen who she monitors and provides with products for them to sell. Elena is very happy with her job, and she dedicates most of her time to it. She also has cosmetics in stock that she offers to her clients, who being loyal request them in advance. Her priority is to improve her business, and to do that she needs more capital to increase her inventory. She has been a client of MFP for a very long time, and has always stood out as being very punctual with her payments. With the requested loan she wants to buy a larger quantity of merchandise so that she has them in stock.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Scinta, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more merchandise to keep in stock.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El señor Mario G. Ortiz cuenta con una vivienda que heredo de su padre el cual en vida les repartió a todos sus hijos. Ahora Mario ve que la casa esta un poco deteriorada por fuera, la tela ya esta un poco antigua la cual necesita arreglarla; es por ello que el pide el apoyo para que su vivienda este en mejores condiciones. Para poder Mario realizar su proyecto y vivir en una casa digna el necesita dinero para comprar material y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en:
Mr. Mario G. Ortiz owns a house that he inherited from his father, which in life he shared with all of his children. Mario has noticed that the exterior of that house has deteriorated some. The plaster is a bit old which needs to be fixed. For this reason, he requests help to improve the condition of his house. To complete this project and live in a dignified house he needs money to pay for materials and labor.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Scinta, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando F. V. es padre de un pequeño al que desea dejarle un buen patrimonio para cuando sea grande.  En este momento Fernando tiene su vivienda en construcción, esta poniendo el techo y también enjarrar las paredes, para terminar su proyecto el necesita mas capital pues los ahorros que el tenia ya se agotaron. Por el momento el vive en la casa de su mama que le apoya para que tenga donde habitar mientras el poco a poco va juntando para su patrimonio.
texts.en:
Fernando F. V. has a young son to whom he desires to give a good estate when he is grown. At the moment Fernando is building his house. He is roofing it and plastering the walls. He needs more capital to complete this project because his savings have already been spent. He is currently living in his mother's house which allows him to have somewhere to live while he slowly builds his estate.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Scinta, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Finish the construction of his house.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Teodoro S. Jiménez cuenta con una vulcanizadora por más de 25 años a la que le ha dedicado  la mayor parte de su vida y con lo que mantiene a su familia. En el negocio ofrece el servicio de colocación de llantas, aire, parchar etc. Teodoro es padre de familia a quien desea ofrecer una mejora calidad de vida es por ello que el desea construir un cuarto para vivir cómodamente.
texts.en:
Teodoro S. Jiménez has had a tire repair shop for over 25 years. He has devoted most of his life to the business, which supports his family. In the business he offers services like installing tires, air, and tire repair, etc. Teodoro is a father who wishes to give his family a better quality of life. That is why he wants to build a room in order to live more comfortably.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build a room

loans.name: La Barranquita Group

texts.es:
ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA LA BARRANQUITA PUES LA CASA DONDE SE REUNE EL GRUPO ESTA A LA ORILLA DE LA BARRANQUITA Y HAY QUE CRUZARLA PARA LLEGAR  A LA CASA.
EL GRUPO LA BARRANQUITA ESTA UBICADO EN MORELOS, MEXICO, ENTRE LOS LÍMITES DEL ESTADO DE MEXICO Y PUEBLA, MUY CERCA DEL VOLCAN POPOCATEPETL.
LA  SRA. VIRGINIA A. QUIEN ES ORIGINARIA DE TETELA DEL VOLCAN, TIENE UN LOCAL DE SEMILLAS Y EL DIA DOMINGO VENDE POZOLE, EL CREDITO LO INVIRTIO PARA COMPRAR  BANCOS, MAIZ Y GAS. SU FAMILIA ESTA CONFORMADA POR SEIS INTEGRANTES LOS CUALES SON SUS  2 HIJOS VARONES, 2 HIJAS, SU ESPOSO Y ELLA; SUS CUATRO HIJOS ESTUDIAN, SUS DOS HIJOS ESTUDIAN LA PRIMARIA Y TIENEN 7 Y 9 AÑOS Y LAS DOS HIJAS ESTUDIAN LA SECUNDARIA Y COMPUTACION Y TIENEN 14 Y 16 AÑOS.                                                        SU ESPOSO TRABAJA EN EL CAMPO.
ELLA DICE QUE CON LAS GANANCIAS ESTA MEJORANDO SU VIVIENDA,  EL PROYECTO QUE TIENE CON RESPECTO A SU NEGOCIO ES  QUE  AL INCREMENTAR SUS VENTAS, PUEDA  SEGUIR INVIRTIENDO EN SU NEGOCIO DE SEMILLAS Y CON LAS GANANCIAS QUE ESTO LE GENERE  CONSTRUIR UN RESPALDO FAMILIAR  ECONOMICO PARA ELLA Y SU FAMILIA Y LOGRAR COMPRAR UN COMEDOR. YA QUE AL DIA DE HOY NO CUENTA CON UNO
texts.en:
This group is called La Barranquita. The house where the group meets is on the banks of La Barranquita, and you have to cross it to get to the house. The La Barranquita group is located in Morelos, Mexico, which is on the border of the states of Mexico and Puebla. It is very close to the Popocatepel volcano. Virginia A. is from Tetela del Volcan. She has a place with seeds. On Sundays she sells “pozole” (a typical soup or stew). She will use the loan to buy benches, corn, and gas. Her family is comprised of six members; two sons, two daughters, her husband, and herself. Her four children go to school. Her two sons, age seven and nine, go to primary school. Her two daughters, age 14 and 16, go to high school and study computer science. Her husband works in the fields. She says that she is improving her home with her earnings. Her business project is to increase her sales and to keep investing in her seed business. With the earnings that are generated from her business she will build economic support for her family and herself. She will buy a dining room because she does not have one.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy benches, corn, and gas

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha tiene 64 años, vive sola en su casa propia, pues sus hijos ya son independientes. Ella se dedica en la venta de productos de belleza, actividad que ha venido desarrollando a lo largo de todos estos años, pues al ser sus hijos ya independientes y no teniendo responsabilidades económicas con ellos, puede realizar su trabajo más cómodamente. Martha es la líder de la zona en la que vive, esto significa que debe organizar a un grupo de compañeras, para que realicen bien la venta y proveerles la cantidad de productos que han logrado vender. Ella se siente muy contenta con el trabajo que realiza, pues ha pensado en seguir mejorando su negocio adquiriendo mayor cantidad de productos y de paso ganar los premios que le ofrece la compañía de cosméticos para la que trabaja. Este es su primer crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser muy puntual con todos los pagos de las cuotas. Martha quiere comprar mayor cantidad de productos de belleza para tenerlos en stock.
texts.en:
Martha, age 64, lives in alone in her own house. Her children are now independent. She sells beauty products, an activity which she has developed over many years. Now that her children are independent and she is not economically responsible for them, she can work more comfortably. Martha is the leader in the area where she lives. That means that she needs to organize a group of colleagues in order to make good sales and to provide them with the products they have sold. She is very happy with the work she does. She has thought about continuing to improve her business by getting more products. Then she would win the prizes offered by the cosmetic company she works for. This is her first loan with MFP, and she promises to be very punctual with all of her payments. Martha wants to buy more beauty products to have them in stock.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a variety of beauty products

loans.name: Holger Gonzalo

texts.es:
Holger de 36 años vive en una zona urbana en las Orquídeas (llamado así porque en su originalidad había muchas flores orquídeas)  de Guayaquil, tiene tres hijos. Cuando el era pequeño su familia tenia una joyería y el aprendió a bañar en el asesoro en oro. Cuando creció el necesitaba mantener a su familia y opto por tener el mismo negocio de su familia. 

Ahora el tiene un taller de joyería, fabrica joyería bañada en oro y plata desde las 09h00am hasta las 18h00pm todos los días y las vende a los almacenes. Para tener mas Inbesos necesita comprar con el préstamo soldaduras, líquidos etc.  

En el futuro quiere un local de joyería y construir mejo su casa.
texts.en:
Holger is 36 years old and lives in an urban zone of Las Qrquideas (called this because originally there were many orchids) in Guayaquil. He has 3 children. When Holger was very young his family had a jewelry store and he learned to apply gold plating. Then he grew up and needed to maintain his family and opted to pursue the same business as his parents. Now he has a jewelry workshop and makes gold- and silver-plated jewelry from 9:00am until 6:00pm every day. Holger sells his works to general stores. In order to have more income he needs this loan to purchase solders, chemicals, etc. In the future he wants to open a jewelry store and build a better house.

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: PURCHASING SOLDERS AND CHEMICALS TO USE IN MAKING JEWELRY

loans.name: Esmeraldas De Comunidad Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Esmeraldas de Comunidad. Está ubicado en el Estado de México, en México.  El grupo está conformado por  12 integrantes y es la segunda vez que solicita un crédito a CrediComún. 
Angélica B. es integrante del grupo. Tiene 35 años, no tiene estudios, sin embargo eso no le impide ser una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, es ama de casa y tiene en total 2 hijos (una mujer y un varón) de 18 y 16 años respectivamente.  Ella se dedica a la crianza de borregos que inició hace 2 años con 2 borregas de las cuales obtuvo crías, las vendió y compro más borregas y de esta manera es como ha crecido su negocio. Solicita el préstamo para comprar forrajes y alimento para alimentar sus borregas y comprar también  unos borreguitos para engordarlos y venderlos. Con las ganancias de este negocio la señora desea juntar un dinerito para comprarse una becerra, crecerla y mantenerla para la producción de leche y queso y dedicarse al comercio de ello, con la finalidad de incrementar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida. También espera poco a poco comprar electrodomésticos que hacen falta en su hogar y nos dice lo primero que piensa adquirir es un refrigerador para mantener frescos y en buen estado los alimentos para el consumo familiar.

Las otras actividades de los demás integrantes del grupo son:
- Gloria M. (Venta de tupperware)
- Gloria H.(Crianza de borregos)
- Paulina H.(Venta de Tacos)
- Celsa H.(Crianza de borregos)
- María N.(Venta de abarrotes)
- Beatriz B.(Crianza de borregos)
- Rosaura B.(Crianza de borregos)
- Paula H.(Crianza de borregos)
- María M.(Crianza de pollos)
- María Elizabeth H.(Crianza de vacas lecheras)
texts.en:
This group is called Esmeraldas de Comunidad and is located in the state of Mexico in Mexico. This group has 12 members and this is the second time that it requests a loan through CrediComun. Group member Angelica B. is 35, and her lack of a formal education doesn't stop her from being hard working and ambitious. She is a homemaker with 2 children, one girl and one boy, ages 18 and 16 respectively. She makes a living raising sheep, which she began 2 years ago with 2 ewes. She was able to breed the ewes, sell the offspring, and so buy more ewes. This is how she has grown her business. She is requesting the loan to buy fodder and feed for her ewes as well as to purchase some lambs to fatten and sell. With the profits she hopes to save up some money to buy a calf. By raising and keeping it to produce milk and cheese for sale, she hopes to increase her earnings and quality of life. She also hopes to gradually acquire the home appliances she needs. She tells us that the first one will be a refrigerator to help keep her family's food fresh and in good condition. The other group member's businesses are as follows: Gloria M.--Tupperware sales Gloria H.--raising sheep Paulina H.--taco sales Celsa H.--raising sheep Maria N--grocery sales Beatriz B.--raising sheep Rosaura B.--raising sheep Paula H.--raising sheep Maria M.--raising chickens Maria Elizabeth H.--raising dairy cows

Translated from Spanish by Solson Scherman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fodder and feed for her sheep as well as to buy some lambs to fatten and sell

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy tiene 28 años, vive con su pareja y sus dos hijos: Jeremy de 7 años y Jasury de 3 años. Todos ellos viven juntos en su casa propia. El trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de productos de belleza, hace 2 años atrás necesitaba de un trabajo que le permitiera permanecer en su hogar el tiempo necesario para ocuparse de sus pequeños hijos y con esta labor lo consiguió. Desde entonces se levanta muy temprana en la mañana para empezar con los labores de la casa y luego se dedica el resto del día en la venta de mercadería. Siendo sus principales clientes, amigas y vecinas, quienes recurren a ella para hacerle algún pedido de las bonitas novedades que ofrece la marca de cosméticos. En un futuro quiere hacer crecer su negocio abasteciéndose de mayor cantidad de productos para así aumentar sus ventas. Este es su primer crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser muy puntual con todos los pagos de las cuotas.
Con el crédito que solicita, comprará productos de belleza para así poder vender en las próximas festividades por el día del padre.
texts.en:
Nancy is 28 and lives with her partner and their two children, 7 year old Jeremy and 3 year old Jasury. They all live together in their own home. For the past two years she has worked selling cosmetics. She needed work that would allow her to be at home enough to take care of her young children, and she found it in cosmetic sales. Since then she gets up very early every morning to start household chores and spends the rest of the day selling merchandise. Her main customers are her friends and neighbors who come to her for the latest attractive offerings from the cosmetics line. In the future she would like to grow her business by stocking more products to help increase her sales. This is her first loan with MFP and she commits herself to being very punctual with her payments. With this loan she plans to purchase cosmetics to sell for the upcoming fathers' day festivities.

Translated from Spanish by Solson Scherman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a variety of cosmetic products

loans.name: Mariana Marlene

texts.es:
Mariana de 36 años, vive en una zona periurbana de Guayaquil, tiene un hijo que le ayuda en ocasiones. Por la falta de oportunidades ella tuvo que invertir sus ahorros en víveres para vender a sus vecinos. 

Poco a poco fue readecuando su casa y convirtiendo la sala en un local para su tienda. Por esa buena decisión ahora ella tiene un tienda con arroz, granos, bebidas etc. En ocasiones su hijo le ayuda cuando termina de hacer los deberes. 

Para tener mas variedad en su negocio quiere comprar arroz, aceite y bebidas con el préstamo. En el futuro quiere continuar con su negocio y terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Mariana is 36, lives in the outskirts of Guayaquil and has a son that helps her occasionally. Due to a lack of opportunities she had to invest her savings in goods to sell to her neighbors. Little by little she re-purposed her home and converted her living room into a store. That good decision means she now has a store with rice, grains, beverages etc. Occasionally her son will help when he is done with his duties. She wants to buy rice, oil and beverages with the loan to offer a greater variety in her store. In the future she wants to continue her business and finish building her home.

Translated from Spanish by Solson Scherman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase rice, oil and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase grain & sugar

loans.name: Tita

texts.es: Tita tiene 50 años, vive en casa propia, en compañía de su pareja y su hija Selene de 8 años. Hace más de un año que empezó a vender productos de belleza, ya que una vecina le incentivo en la venta por estar en este trabajo. Con el tiempo ha logrado a ganar experiencia, ahora le es rentable el negocio, pues parte de su éxito se debe en el buen trato hacia sus clientes, también conoce los productos que ofrece y eso le da mucha confianza a la clientela. En un futuro ha pensado seguir en este rubro hasta convertirse en líder y así acceder a las ventajas de este negocio, ya que sus ingresos aumentarían al mismo tiempo su experiencia. Este es su primer crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser muy puntual con todos los pagos de las cuotas. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mayor cantidad de productos de belleza para así tenerlo en stock.
texts.en:
Tita is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and eight year old daughter Selene. A year and a half ago, she began selling beauty products after a neighbor convinced her to start this business. Over time, she gained experience and now has a profitable business. Part of her success is attributed to the good service she provides to her customers. She is also knowledgeable about the products she offers and demonstrates great confidence with her customers. In the future, she hopes to remain in this field until she becomes a leader and has access to the advantages that come with the business. She will continue to gain more experience as her income increase.

This is her first loan with MFP. Tita promises to be prompt with all of her payments. The loan she requested will be used to buy a larger quantity of beauty products so that she will have them in stock.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a variety of cosmetics

loans.name: Liliana Del Pilar

texts.es:
Liliana tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo, vive junto a su familia en el caserío Tongorrape, una zona rural del distrito de Motupe, conocido a nivel nacional por sus festividades religiosas, la zona pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra ubicada a una hora y veinte minutos  de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace dos años y medio a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una  bodega ubicada en su vivienda, el negocio ha ido progresando gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación, ella siempre ha ofrecido a sus clientes productos de buena calidad y buen trato. La bodega goza de muy buena acogida ya que la zona queda lejos del pueblo de Motupe y los pobladores no tienen acceso facil a productos de consumo diario.

Con los ingresos que percibe, Liliana apoya a su esposo a sostener la economía de su familia, su esposo trabaja como obrero agrícola en un fundo de la zona. Ella desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas artículos para ofrecerlos en venta y de esa manera ampliar sus ganancias, para lograr su objetivo ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo hasta convertirse en comerciante mayorista. Ella ya ha trabajado anteriormente con Nuestra Institución y ha demostrado ser una cliente puntual y responsable al momento de asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Liliana, 27, is married and has a son. She lives with her family in the Tongorrape settlement, in the rural area of the Motupe district. This area is known at the national level for its religious festivals. It is part of the Lambayeque province, and is located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo. For 2 and a half years, she has been selling basic necessities and groceries in a store located in her home. She has been making progress with her business, thanks to her effort and dedication. She always has offered her customers a good deal on high quality products. The store has been well-received, since the area is far from the town of Motupe, and the population does not have easy access to the consumer products used on a daily basis. With the income that she earns, Liliana helps her husband to support the family. Her husband works as an agricultural field hand for a company in the area. She wants to expand her business by purchasing more items to offer for sale, and in this way increase her earnings. To achieve this, she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 Peruvian soles. Her main wish is to continue to grow to the point where she can become a wholesale merchant. She has worked previously with our institution, and has demonstrated that she is a punctual client who is responsible in making her payments.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy groceries and products that are basic necessities to expand her business

loans.name: Héctor

texts.es: Héctor V. S., tiene la edad de 28 años, está soltero y vive con sus padres.  El crédito lo quiere para la compra de materiales y productos para la mejoras en el área de repastos. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento  a la cercas y en poder mantener  calidad en los repastos, para que el ganado que tiene se desarrolle de la mejor manera y así obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. También desea aumentar el número de animales y poder mantenerlos en mejores condiciones, cuenta con un área que desea mejorar. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Héctor tiene algunos años dedicado al ganado. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Héctor V. S. is 28 years old, single, and lives with his parents. He is requesting this loan to buy materials and products to make improvements to his pastures. He wants to perform proper maintenance on the fences and to be able to maintain high-quality pastures, so that his cattle will develop as well as possible and therefore fetch the best price possible when he sells them. He also hopes to increase his number of animals and to be able to keep them under better conditions, and he has a specific area he would like to improve. This is the first time he is receiving a loan from FUDECOSUR and he is very happy with the services they have offered him. Mr. Héctor has been raising cattle for several years. In the future, he hopes to be able to provide his family with a better quality of life and greater economic stability. He would also like to be able to continue growing as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to make improvements to cattle pastures

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es: Eugenia es una trabajadora mujer de 53 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en su casa propia. Ella se dedica desde hace 2 años en la venta y elaboración de ropa, actividad que le gusta mucho, puesto que le resulta muy cómodo realizarlo desde su propia casa. La forma de trabajo de Eugenia consiste en comprar ropa de un reconocido mercado de su ciudad y trasladarlo hasta su casa donde diariamente sale a ofrecer la mercadería a sus vecinas y a sus fieles clientes, quienes le realizan pedidos. Paralelo a este trabajo, también se dedica a confeccionar prendas, gracias a su conocimiento de costura, elaborando variedad de vestidos, blusas, de acuerdo el gusto de los clientes. En un futuro quisiera tener una gran tienda, pero sabe que solo llegará a su meta trabajando muy duro, es por eso que le pone tanto empeño a su trabajo. Es su tercer crédito con MFP y asegura que será muy puntual con todos sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mayor cantidad de mercadería en ropa para así poder aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Eugenia is a hardworking woman who is 53 years old. She lives with her husband and their two children in their own home. For 2 years, she has been making and selling clothing. This is an activity that she enjoys very much, since it is very comfortable for her to do from her own home. Eugenia buys clothing from a well-known market in her city, and takes it to her house where she each day she goes out to offer it for sale to her neighbors and loyal customers, who buy her clothing through orders. In addition to this work, she also makes garments, thanks to her knowledge of dressmaking. She makes a variety of dresses and blouses according to the tastes of her customers. In the future she would like to have a big store, but she knows that she will only achieve this goal if she works very hard. It is for this reason that she puts so much effort into her work. This is her third loan with MFP, and she assures us that she will be very punctual with each of her payments. With the loan she requests, she will buy a greater quantity of clothing so that she can increase her income.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing) to increase her business

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
María Isabel tiene 36 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el caserío Punto Cuatro, una zona rural del distrito de Mochumí, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provicia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a cuarenta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de dos años a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega ubicada en la zona donde vive, este negocio nació de la necesidad de contar con un ingreso adicional con el cual solventar la economía de su familia. Adicionalmente vende pescado en los caseríos de la zona, es ayudada en este negocio por su esposo.

Ellos han sabido sacar adelante a estas actividades con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación, se han hecho conocidos en la zona gracias a la calidad de productos y al buen trato que ofrecen. Actualmente María Isabel ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la compra de mas artículos para ampliar su bodega.

María Isabel es una mujer honesta y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es poder seguir trabajando para ofrecerle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar alguna carrera tecnica o superior, en la zona donde vive sus vecinos la estiman mucho y admiran su capacidad de trabajo.
texts.en:
María Isabel is 36 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in the Punto Cuatro settlement, in a rural area of the Mochumí district. This is an agricultural area that is part of the Lambayeque province, and is located 40 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. For more than 2 years she has sold staples and groceries from a store located in the home where she lives. This business was started up because of the need to have a second income to cover the household expenses. She also sells fish in the settlements in the area, and her husband helps her with this business. They have known that they must put a lot of effort and dedication into these activities in order to succeed. They have become well known in the area thanks to the quality of their products and the good prices that they offer. María Isabel is now requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for the first time for 500 Peruvian soles that she will use to buy more products to increase her business. María Isabel is an honest and hardworking woman. Her main wish is to be able to continue working so that she can provide her children with the opportunity to study for a technical or college degree. In the neighborhood where she lives her neighbors hold her in high esteem and admire her work ethic.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy staples and groceries to expand the store that is set up in her house

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Fatou S. est une femme de 59 ans, elle est veuve et mère de 06 enfants et tutrice d'un garçon et d'une fille confiés par des proches. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SAMBA 15 ANS2 depuis le 17 juillet 2006, date de création dudit Banc Villageois. Elle fait du commerce de tissus, elle va jusqu'au Mali, un pays frontalier au Sénégal pour s'approvisionner en marchandises. La plus part de son produit est vendu à la capital (Dakar) et de là bas elle achète de l'encens pour revendre dans son quartier. Son nouveau crédit lui permettre d'accroître son activité afin de réaliser plus de bénéfices et répondre aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Fatou S. is a 59-year old woman who is a widow and mother to six children; she is also guardian to a boy and a girl who were entrusted to her care by close relatives. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois in SAMBA 15ANS2 since 17th July 2006, the date the aforementioned Banc Villageois was set up. She trades in fabrics and goes to Mali, a country which borders on Senegal, to get her supplies. The majority of her products are sold in the capital (Dakar), and there she buys incense to resell in her neighborhood. Her new loan will allow her to grow her business in order to make more money and respond to the needs of her children.

Translated from French by Alison Le Bras, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the level of her production

loans.name: Diarry

texts.fr: Diarry K. est une femme de 51 ans; elle est veuve et mère de 05 enfants. Elle est membre du banc Villageois de KOUNK. V.W. depuis le 12 septembre 2005 elle a une expérience de 3 ans et demi et a 7 fois de suite bénéficié de crédit et n'a jamais eu de problème de remboursement. Elle vend sur table divers produits culinaires et des légumes au marché central de se quartier, et son prêt lui permettra de mieux développer son activité commerciale et augmentant son niveau d'approvisionnement. Son objectif est de prendre en charge sa progéniture tout en subvenant à ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
Diarry K. is a 51-year-old woman who is a widow and the mother of five children.  She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of KOUNK. V.W. since September 12, 2005.  She has 3½ years of experience and has had seven consecutive loans without ever a problem repaying.   On her table, Diarry sells a variety of kitchen products and vegetables at the central market of district.  Her loan will enable her to improve her business and to increase her stock of inventory.  Her goal is to take care of her children while supporting herself.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Bolstering and developing her revenue-generating business

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 62 años, es una amable mujer que vive sola en su casa propia pues esta separada D. su esposo y sus hijos ya son independientes. Ella se dedica desD. hace 6 años en la venta D. tortas, pastillos y demás postres, gracias a sus grandes dotes culinarias. DesD. muy joven siempre se ha caracterizado por preparar lo más deliciosos postres. Ahora al no tener más responsabilidad, puesto que sus hijos son independientes, se dedicó a esta labor, ya que le permite sentirse cómoda y tranquila, preparando tortas ha pedido. Carmen le gusta mucho su trabajo, pues le gusta preparar estos postres, ya que dan mucha alegría a los cumpleaños, 15 años, matrimonios y toda actividad que se presentan y en aquel trabajo donD. sienta gran satisfacción D. realizarlo. Este es su décimo crédito con MFP siendo muy responsable y puntual con los pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mayor cantidad D. ingredientes para preparar sus postres y así cumplir con sus pedidos pendientes.
texts.en:
Carmen, 62, is a pleasant woman who lives alone in her own home, as she is separated from her husband and her children are independent. For 6 years she has sold tarts, pastries and other desserts, thanks to her great culinary skills. Ever since she was very young, she has always prepared the most delicious desserts. Now that her children are independent and she does not have many responsibilities, she works, preparing orders. This work allows her to feel comfortable and calm. Carmen likes her job very much, and she enjoys preparing these desserts. They proviD. much joy at birthdays, 15th birthday balls, weddings and all other activities that arise, and she gets great satisfaction doing so. This is her tenth loan with MFP; she is always punctual with payments. With the requested loan, she will buy a greater amount of ingredients to prepare her desserts and fill her pending orders.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of more ingredients for desserts

loans.name: Las Camelias Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Las Camelias inicia su primer ciclo, la mayor parte de socias son vecinas del mismo barrio de Covadonga.
  
Flor de Maria es conviviente, tiene 32 años y 3 hijos que están estudiando y en su casa se realizaran las reuniones de su Banco Comunal, Flor de Maria vende salchipapas en la puerta de su casa, actividad que realiza todos los días por las tardes, y durante la mañana vende gelatina de manera ambulatoria cerca de su barrio, la preparación de las gelatinas los realiza por las noches, Flor de Maria perteneció a otro Banco Comunal y se retiro por motivo de viaje y retorna porque le gusta el ahorro y también porque conoce a nuevas amigas. Flor de Maria tiene proyectado iniciar la implementación de una tienda. Con su préstamo comprara gelatina y muebles para la tienda que implementará.

Flor de Maria sueña con seguir trabajando, terminar de implementar su tienda, y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Camelias" is starting its first loan cycle. Most of its members are neighbors in the same area of Covadonga. Flor de Maria is 32 years old and has a live-in partner and 3 children who are in school. The communal bank meetings take place in her house. Flor de Maria sells salchipapas [a snack of French fries and pieces of sausage] from the door of her house. She does this work every afternoon, while during the morning she sells gelatin as a mobile vendor in her neighborhood. She prepares the gelatin in the evenings. Flor de Maria used to belong to a different communal bank; she withdrew because she was traveling, but she returned to the system because she likes to save and also because it is a way to meet new friends. Flor de Maria plans to open a store in the near future. With her loan, she will buy gelatin as well as furnishings for her new store. Flor de Maria's dream is to continue working, fully implement her store, and help her children become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying gelatin as well as furnishings for the store she is opening

loans.name: Ndèye

texts.fr: Ndèye D. est une femme de 54 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. Elle est membre de Banc Villageois depuis 2005 et a 7 fois de suite reçu de crédit et n'a jamais eu de problème de remboursement. C'est une femme pleine de volonté et de hargne, elle ne ménage pas d'effort pour trouver des ressources qui contribuent à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille. Elle fait un petit commerce d'arachide, de chaussures et avec son petit seau rempli d'encens elle fait du porte à porte pour en vendre aux femmes de son quartier. Les bénéfices réalisés à partir de son activité lui servent à investir dans les besoins familiaux
texts.en:
Ndèye D. is a 54-year-old woman who is married and the mother of six children.  She has been a member of Banc Villageois since 2005. She has received seven consecutive loans and has never had problems repaying.  Full of will, she is a real go-getter of a woman who spares no effort in finding resources to help improve her family's living conditions.   Ndèye has a small-scale business selling peanuts and shoes.  And with her small bucket filled with incense, she goes from door to door selling them to the women in the neighborhood.  The profits made from her work will be invested in her family.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing her investment capital

loans.name: Rosa Avelina

texts.es:
La señora Rosa D. es socia del banco comunal Corazón de Jesús, vive en la parroquia el Valle comunidad el Despacho, en su mayor parte su población se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería pero los jóvenes han migrado a la ciudad en busca de mejores oportunidades de trabajo.

Nuestra socia tiene 44 años de vida, es una mujer viuda,  su esposo murió dominado por el alcohol, hace dos año, en su unión conyugal ha procreado 5 hijos los cuales tienen 22, 20, 18, 16, 15, años de edad, su hijo de 22 años trabaja como ayudante de albañil el cual le ayuda a su mamá económicamente, la hija de 20 años trabaja en un restaurante y  realiza sus estudios a distancia los días domingos; su hijo de 18 años luego de mucho luchar finalmente se ha graduado en el SECAP; el otro hijo de 16años por el momento está estudiando en el colegio; y finalmente su hija de 15 años trabaja como niñera y estudia los días sábados, toda esta familia vive en unos pequeños cuartos que han construido en los terrenos de su padre.

La señora Rosa trabaja en su casa realizando los quehaceres domésticos, también se dedica ala cría de cerdos y de aves domesticas. Es socia de nuestra institución por un periodo de 7 ciclos, y así ha podido  incrementar la cantidad de animales, para luego venderlos y así satisfacer sus necesidades diarias. Con el nuevo crédito que recibe por parte de la fundación ESPOIR lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos y pollos. El sueño más deseado por nuestra socia es de tener una casita propia donde poder vivir con toda su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa D. is a member of the communal bank "Corazón de Jesús." She lives in the El Valle parish of the community of Despacho. There the majority of the population works in agriculture and livestock, but the younger ones have migrated to the city to look for better work opportunities. Rosa is 44 years old and is a widow. Her husband died 2 years ago of alcoholism. Their marriage produced 5 children, who are now 22, 20, 18, 16,and 15 years old. Her oldest son works as an mason's assistant, and helps his mother economically. Her 20 year old daughter works in a restaurant, and also is completing distance studies during each Sunday. Her 18 year-old son, after a long struggle, finally graduated from SECAP. The other son, who is 16, is currently studying in secondary school. Finally, her 15 year-old daughter works in child care and studies on Saturdays. The whole family lives in small rooms that were built on their father's lands. Rosa works in the home carrying out household chores, and she also raises pigs and poultry. She has been a member of our institution for 7 loan cycles, and in this way she has been able to increase the number of animals that she has, so that she can later sell them and support herself. With the new loan that she is receiving from the fundación ESPOIR, she will invest in the purchase of pigs and chicken. Her biggest dream is to have her own little house where she could live with her whole family.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens

loans.name: Astou

texts.fr: Astou K. est une femme de 53 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants en charge. elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SAMBA 15ANS1 depuis le 19 juillet 2002, elle a une expérience de 7 ans et demi dans ledit Banc Villageois et y a reçu 15 prêts qu'elle a toujours bien géré et remboursé à temps. Elle achète des tissus teintés dans d'autres régions pour revendre dans sa ville (Vélingara). Avec son nouveau prêt elle va augmenter sa production afin de faire plus de bénéfices et participer à la prise en charge des besoins de la famille, par exemple la santé, la nourriture et la scolarité. Elle a aussi comme objectif de renforcer son niveau d'épargne.
texts.en:
Astou K. is a 53-year-old woman who is married and the mother of seven children.  She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of SAMBA 15 ANS1 since July 19, 2002.  She has 7½ years of experience with the aforementioned Banc Villageois and has received from it fifteen loans, which she always managed and repaid on time.   Astou purchases dyed fabrics in other regions in order to resell them in her town (Vélingara).  With her new loans, she is going to increase her production in order to make more profit and to help provide for her family in terms of, as examples, health care, food, and schooling.  She also has the goal of boosting her savings.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Advancing her revenue-generating business

loans.name: Aïssatou Combé

texts.fr: Aïssatou Combé D. est une femme de 58 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du banc Villageois de SAMBA 15 ANS1 dont elle est la secrétaire depuis 2005, année de création dudit Banc Villageois. Elle est très dynamique et joue un rôle important dans le groupe en renforçant la solidarité entre les membres. Elle fait un petit commerce de pâte d'arachide, d'huile de palme et de balais traditionnels faits à partir de feuilles de palmier. Son objectif est de renforcer son niveau d'épargne et de participer à la prise en charge de la famille, par exemple la santé et la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Aïssatou Combé D. is a 58-year old woman, married and the mother of three dependent children. She is a member of the Banc Villageois [borrowing group] of SAMBA 15 ANS1 and has been its secretary since the borrowing group’s creation in 2005. She is very energetic and plays an important role in strengthening the spirit of solidarity among the group members. Her business is selling peanut sauce, palm oil and traditional brooms made with palm leaves. Her goal is to boost her savings and to help with the family expenses, such as healthcare and schooling of her children.

Translated from French by Ekaterina Sukhanova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Bolstering  her business capital

loans.name: María Evangelina

texts.es:
La Sra. María T. es socia del banco comunal Corazón de Jesús, vive en el valle en una comunidad llamada Paloma, en su mayor parte su población se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería pero los jóvenes han migrado a la ciudad en busca de mejores oportunidades de trabajo.

Nuestra socia tiene 48 años de edad, es de estado civil divorciada y ha procreado 5 hijos que se encuentran de 25, 24, 19, 15, 14 años de edad. De los cuales los tres primeros hijos ya tiene sus propios hogares y todos viven de manera independiente; los dos últimos hijos de 15 y 14 años están trabajando en una carpintería ayudando a su madre con el dinero que ellos ganan aun que no mucho pero por lo menos para las necesidades  de la casa y de su familia, la Señora María tiene  casa propia en  donde viven felizmente ella y el resto de su espléndida familia.

La señora vive de las ganancias obtenidas por la venta de las carnes de  chancho, pollo, y cuyes  que ella misma se encarga de criarlos, también se dedica a la venta de leche de ganado vacuno, todas las ventas lo realiza dentro de su de propia comunidad donde vive. Nuestra socia ha recibido de la institución 3 créditos; los cuales  los ha solicitado para poder adquirir más animales para su negocio. Con su nuevo crédito que recibe de la fundación ESPOIR lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca lechera.

Su mayor sueño es comprar un terreno para construir las casas para sus hijos ya que este sueño lo ha venido deseando desde mucho tiempo atrás y espera lograrlo algún día.
texts.en:
Ms. María T. is a member of the communal bank "Corazón de Jesús" ("Heart of Jesus"). She lives in a valley community called Paloma, where most of the residents work in agriculture or raise livestock. Younger residents, however, have migrated to the city in search of better work opportunities. María is 48 years old, divorced, and has 5 children who are 25, 24, 19, 15, and 14 years old. The three oldest children already have their own homes and live independently. The two younger children, who are 15 and 14 years old, are working in a carpentry shop and helping their mother with the money they earn. Although it is not a lot, at least it is enough for the basic needs of their home and family. Ms. María has her own house where she lives happily with the rest of her wonderful family. She lives off the earnings from selling the meat of pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs that she raises herself. She also sells milk from cattle. She makes all of her sales in the community where she lives. She has received 3 loans from this organization. She requested them in order to acquire more animals for her business. She is going to invest in the purchase of a dairy cow with her newest loan from Fundación ESPOIR. Her greatest dream is to buy land to build houses for her children. She has been dreaming of this for a long time already and hopes to achieve it some day.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Kadiatou

texts.fr: Kadiatou B. est une femme de 45 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 09 enfants en charge.
